meanings.definition: A large elevated area of level land.
meanings.sent1: The explorers set up camp on the vast tableland.
meanings.sent2: The cattle grazed peacefully on the expansive tableland.
meanings.sent3: The picnic on the tableland was a delightful experience.
meanings.sent4: From the tableland, the view of the surrounding valleys was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The tableland stretched out like a giant natural plateau.

meanings.sent1: She carefully tablelanded the map to study the terrain.
meanings.sent2: The workers tablelanded the equipment for easy access.
meanings.sent3: He tablelanded the snacks for the outdoor party.
meanings.sent4: The chef tablelanded the ingredients before starting to cook.
meanings.sent5: They tablelanded the telescope on the hill for stargazing.
